message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product at a price of $13,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial for you, and this price reflects its true value.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the potential value of the product, but $13,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't let this product go for less than $11,500. It's a fair price considering the value it will bring you.
